tasks.title: Grocery Shopping Assistance
tasks.description: Need help with weekly grocery shopping. List will be provided.

tasks.title: Doctor's Appointment Companion
tasks.description: Looking for someone to accompany me to a doctor's appointment next week.

tasks.title: Garden Maintenance Help
tasks.description: Need assistance with light gardening tasks in my backyard.

tasks.title: Technology Tutoring
tasks.description: Would like help learning how to use my new smartphone.

tasks.title: Light Home Repairs
tasks.description: Need help fixing a leaky faucet and changing some light bulbs.

tasks.title: Pick up Medications
tasks.description: I need some help picking up medications from the pharmacy, I have hard time walking there by myself lately.

tasks.title: Buy Medications
tasks.description: I need someone to buy me some medications and deliver them to me

messages.content: Hello! I'd be happy to accompany you to your doctor's appointment. What time should I pick you up?
Thank you, Gavriel. The appointment is at 2 PM. Could you pick me up at 1:30 PM?
Hi Michael! I've finished the gardening tasks. Is there anything else you'd like me to do?
Thank you, Sarah! Everything looks great. That's all for today.
Hello Emma! I'm looking forward to helping you with your smartphone. Shall we start with the basics?
Yes, please! I'm particularly interested in learning how to use video calling apps.
i will help! when do you need it?
I'm out by tomorrow so today will be great.
